website_summaries.verdict: Best choice for beer connoisseurs who like to throw parties – outside, inside or both.
pros: Gets top marks for large interior space that can hold a full size keg, pony or 3 sixth barrel kegs
Digital display makes it easy to check temperature
Wheels make it a breeze to move around
cons: Some owners say the first few pours after installation are too foamy

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC KEGERATOR
customer_reviews.text: This kegerator works just like described. Perfect for a keg of brew. Cools great and holds the temp +- 2 degrees. Been using it now for 2 weeks and love it. Added a tower fan to keep the beer cool to the tap but other than that, only addition i made was a high accuracy thermometer to test the cooling. Hoping it keeps working for yrs into the future.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Nelson

customer_reviews.title: but was accomplished pretty well. Like the idea that delivery could be ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Delivery was difficult due to coordination of work schedules, but was accomplished pretty well. Like the idea that delivery could be done on Saturday. So far the kegerator appears to be a big hit especially since it is on wheels and can be moved the backyard near the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my kegerator
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my kegerator. I am completely spoiled now and hate drinking beer from a can or even a bottle. Word to the wise. Go ahead and buy a cleaning kit as you will need it in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Keel

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the value
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged very well, no damage in delivery. I have two thermometers, one in back and one in the front. Set on 32, the back one stays between 30-34, front one stays 33-38. I haven't added fans yet, but intend to. However, it comes out ice cold, so I haven't gotten in any hurry to do it. Everything works as it should. I think it's an excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Oleson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kegerator
customer_reviews.text: The kegerator works great, I only have two issues. The tower is kinda flimsy, it moves a lot when you are pouring a beer. The other is more of a personal preference and its the way the CO2 is split by a tee. I bought a tee with shutoffs for each tap when I am only using one keg.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick nunez

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: It will make your beer cold if you set it really low. I set mine at 32 and it’s pretty cold, not the coldest but pretty good. Leaves enough room with a half keg in it to put a variety of cans/bottles, what ever else you like in there with it. Good addition for my home bar.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: This Kegerator will not disappoint you. I have owed several kegerators in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This Kegerator will not disappoint you. I have owed several kegerators in the past. This kegerator is the best I have ever owed. It really keeps your beer cold. If you set it to cold it will freeze the line. If you like ice cold beer this is a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kegerator so far
customer_reviews.text: Great kegerator so far. I have it for 2 months and it works good. You can not really fit 3 of the smaller kegs like it says you can. They keeps pushing the door open so I had to put a latch on the side to make it work. Other than that, I am happy so far
customer_reviews.author: stelios m.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shipping, excellent packaging
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shipping, excellent packaging, excellent quality product! Been using for 1+ year now and works like the day I bought it. Very quiet, and best of all, no noticeable changes in my monthly electric bill.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good looking machine. Well built.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. Shipped fast. Did not come with a spanner wrench that was advertised. Ill edit later after I have had it longer.
customer_reviews.author: B Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for Christmas and he loves it and so does his friends who are looking at purchasing for themselves. Deliver was delayed until after the holiday but other than that product is as described and able to use 2 kegs at a time.
customer_reviews.author: amelia glenn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We bought different handles that screw on that give it that extra sparkle! I love filling up my cup whenever I want!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for beer lovers!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his Edge Star. Easy to operate and keeps beer ice cold. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Nordeste

customer_reviews.title: Buy only from them!
customer_reviews.text: Customer Serivice is 100 % on the money. Will buy from them again. THey came through in a tight sport and are very much a company that keeps to its word:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and outstanding company-Compact Appliance. Will never hesitate to do business with them again!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Operates as expected. Great service after the sale from the vendor. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Kegerator
customer_reviews.text: Love my Kegerator. The unit arrived with a dent in the back and since there wasn't any damage on the box, it could only have happened at the factory. Seller was great and offered a replacement or some money back. I'm even using it to lager some home-brew and so far it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: R. Hartung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my application. ....I converted it into a dual take bottom fed kegerator....☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: GOT IT WITH IN 7 DAYS, LOVE IT .... WORKS GREAT. EASY TO PUT TO GATHER...........cheer!
customer_reviews.author: ML Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't work as described, Does not work right. Save your money and buy elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Ian McCulloch

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Works great ! And it does fit 3, 1/6 kegs. Like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Converts to a fridge
customer_reviews.text: When I’m not using the keg function, I like that it comes with shelving so that I can use it as a mini fridge. It’s great for leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: EdgeStar KC3000 Full Size Kegerator with Digital Display - Black
feature_bullets: PLEASE NOTE: Part number BR3001BL will be shown on the retail box and all needed items that comprise the KC3000 will be included within this same box; Freestanding operation only; Digital display; Adjustable temperature
Deep chill mode; Dispensing components included; Temperature range: 32-50 °F (0-10 °C)
Guard rail, drip tray, & casters included; Includes two (2) wire shelves for refrigerator use
Fits half-barrel, slim quarter, corny, and sixth barrel kegs; Dimensions (fridge only without casters or tower) 33 1/2" H x 23 5/8" W x 23 3/8" D

PLEASE NOTE: Delivery will be curbside, inside delivery is not available. A valid phone number is required for delivery purposes, please ensure the correct phone number is provided in your shipping information when placing this order.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars59 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
